# NatChat

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of NatChat is to provide fast, local-language-model-powered summaries of articles from the current issues of Nature journals, making cutting-edge science more accessible and digestible.

## Installation

You can install the development version of NatChat from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("monahton/NatChat")
```
